apps.title: Basic App
apps.description: A basic React app, ready to add your own custom designs and features to!

games.title: Virtual Pet
games.description: A simple virtual pet base project. An animal moves back and forth within the screen space, interacts with a ball, and eats food.

games.title: Space Arcade
games.description: A twist on the classic space shooter genre!

games.title: Pong
games.description: A simple recreation of the physics involved with the classic Pong game.

games.title: Platformer
games.description: A simple recreation of the physics involved with a basic platformer game.

games.title: Simple Physics Skeleton
games.description: An incredibly simple example of joint constraints, limited to joints affecting each other in one direction.
